MetricDescription: % agency components with incident handling and response capability
Target:
X % or higher, 
X % higher than previous period, 
X % increase over a defined period 

Higher is better, ideally 100%
Source: NIST (Archived): SP 800-55, Security Metrics Guide for Information Technology Systems

MetricDescription: Number of incidents reported to FedCIRC, NIPC, and local law enforcement
Source: NIST (Archived): SP 800-55, Security Metrics Guide for Information Technology Systems
